caption: A group of people are dancing in a room, and several chipmunks are also dancing nearby. A cruise ship sails on the ocean. People are dining in a restaurant, and a mascot walks by a server. Some soup spills onto a man. The mascot and the man go to the deck. The mascot takes off its headpiece, chats with the man, then puts it back on and leaves. Inside a casino, a group of people is sitting, and chipmunks stand on the casino table. The man approaches the mascot and another man in a white uniform, carrying a chipmunk-covered tree. During the day, the man sits in a beach chair with chipmunks by his side.

breakpoint.question: Where is the scene?
breakpoint.answer: On the deck of the ship.
